casebody.data:
The State ex rel. May, Appellant, v. Hendon, Judge, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. May v. Hendon (1993), 68 Ohio St.3d 118.]

(No. 93-1118 Submitted November 9, 1993 Decided December 29, 1993.) Morris May, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
